inclusion.criterion: RIT to ablate the thyroid remnant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomization to treatment arms A and B
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: RTx is begun after documented elimination of cervical I-131 uptake
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient follow-up includes out-patient appointments with cervical ultrasound and measurement of serum TSH
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: papillary or follicular thyroid carcinoma pT4 pN0/1/x M0/x
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: completion of primary surgical therapy with R0 (no tumor residues) or R1 (microscopic residues) resection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: freedom from distant metastases at the time of initial radioiodine therapy
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is undergoing treatment, but has a history of previous surgery and radiation therapy which may make them ineligible for this trial.
